name: M5Stack ATOM Matrix ESP32
description: Compact IoT development device with 5x5 RGB LED matrix, integrated buttons, and expansion possibilities. Perfect for small monitoring applications and prototyping.

name: RAK WisBlock Starter KitNEWWW
description: Modular IoT development platform with stackable blocks including core, sensor, and wireless modules. Designed for rapid prototyping of IoT solutions.

name: T1000 E TESTING123
description: ESP32-based LoRa + GPS development board designed for IoT applications with long-range communication needs. Popular for Meshtastic implementations.
